name: Canal View Inn
review_snippets: Beautiful view over the canals and cozy rooms.
Staff was friendly and the breakfast was decent.

name: Budget Stay Central
review_snippets: Very affordable and close to the city center.
Rooms are small and a bit noisy at night.

name: Quiet Garden Hotel
review_snippets: Lovely quiet location with a beautiful garden.
Perfect if you want to relax away from the crowds.

name: Luxury Canal Palace
review_snippets: Amazing service and spacious rooms with canal views.
Quite expensive but worth it for a special stay.

name: Hostel City Hub
review_snippets: Great social atmosphere and very cheap.
Bathrooms could be cleaner, but overall good value.
